headline: Edison International (EIX) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Edison International (EIX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +10.23% and +8.36%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Edison International (EIX) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates

headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) Reports Next Week: Wall Street Expects Earnings Growth
summary: Vistra (VST) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Third Point Q2 2025 Investor Letter
summary: Third Point corporate credit was up 2.9% gross (2.1% net) for the second quarter, bringing 2025 performance to 3.0% gross (1.8% net). Read more here.

headline: Dynegy to pay $38M to settle charges it manipulated MISO’s capacity market
summary: The case shows how easy it is for companies to manipulate regional transmission organization capacity auctions and underscores the need for stronger safeguards, said a consumer watchdog.

raw.headline: Dynegy to pay $38M to settle charges it manipulated MISO’s capacity market
raw.summary: The case shows how easy it is for companies to manipulate regional transmission organization capacity auctions and underscores the need for stronger safeguards, said a consumer watchdog.
